name: autovrse-assignment
description: [Clone the repo](git@github.com:danieljkpraveen/autovrse-assignment.git) ### Backend - Create a python virtual environment - Install the dependencies ```bash pip install -r requirements.txt ``` - To run the server execute run.sh ### Frontend - From the project repo, cd into r3f-frontend and execute the script that is inside requirements.txt - Do npm start to run the server
